item.description: https://www.facebook.... Endless War? Inflation Tax? Bailouts for Wall Street? The Fed did it! It’s time to gather once more at the Boston Federal Reserve Building so the chant can be heard. The gathering in March was rather small but we got a lot of flyers and DVDs into people’s hands. A highlight for me, other than meeting more great folks, was when a cabbie drove by slowly, held up his copy of “End the Fed” and beeped like crazy. Let’s do it again! Please bring your DVDs, flyers, and determination on July 18th. If you can’t make it, please help by spreading the word. Thanks!!! Sources for flyers and information: http://endthefedusa.n... http://www.auditthefe... http://www.campaignfo... https://www.facebook....
item.name: Protest the Federal Reserve
